title: EP 213: A Perfect Peen, Parody Porn & Gangbangs ( Ft. Lisa Ann)
itunes:title: EP 213: A Perfect Peen, Parody Porn & Gangbangs ( Ft. Lisa Ann)
description:
This week the duo is joined Pornstar legend Lisa Ann to discuss everything under the sun including how global warming is effecting penis sizes around the world, what a perfect penis is to us and how many we believe we can take at a time. Lisa Ann shares her thoughts on the porn industry today in comparison to what it was like for her and her decision to completely leave, now enjoying her life as a fantasy sports radio host and author. The outline went out the window this week and while Mandii panicked, Lisa and Weezy laughed it out the entire way through! 


Follow this week’s guest 

Instagram @thereallisaann

Support Lisa Ann by becoming a subscriber to her Onlyfans page Onlyfans.com/thereallisaann and purchase her book “The Life” on Amazon at the link below:

https://www.amazon.com/Life-Playin-Sports-Living-Fullest/dp/B08JM9FQK9/ref=sr_1_1?dchild=1&keywords=lisa+ann&qid=1617805764&sr=8-1


Follow the hosts on social media Weezy @Weezywtf & Mandii @Fullcourtpumps and follow the Whoreible Decisions pages

Instagram @whoreible_decisions

Twitter @whoreiblepod


Don't forget to tag #whoreibledecisions or @ us to let us know what you think of this week's episode!
